mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document_file ( doc_no, doc_category_no, doc_origin_filename, doc_save_filename, doc_filetype, doc_filesize, createdate, updatedate, create_id, update_id ) VALUES ( #{docNo}, #{docCategoryNo}, #{docOriginFilename}, #{docSaveFilename}, #{docFiletype}, #{docFilesize}, #{createdate}, #{updatedate}, #{empNo}, #{empNo} )
